txt.en: Rípmaush has staked the heads of many Rohirrim victims in Marton's Mead Hall, defiling the corpses and the seat of the Thane.\n\nSuch desecrations should not be allowed to stand and rot. You should burn the hideous stakes to undo the hideous work of Rípmaush.
You have burned the desecrated heads on stakes in Marton's Mead Hall.
Rípmaush has staked the heads of many Rohirrim victims in Marton's Mead Hall, defiling the corpses and the seat of the Thane.
You have burned the desecrated heads on stakes in Marton's Mead Hall.\n\nSuch a wrong cannot be righted, but destroying the Orc's hideous work is better than letting it stand.
Severed heads can be found in the Mead Hall of Marton.\n\nYou should burn the severed heads on stakes.
